text: The 2017 Conference USA Baseball Tournament will be held from May 24 through May 28 at MGM Park in Biloxi, Mississippi. The annual tournament determines the conference champion of the Division I Conference USA for college baseball. The tournament champion will receive the league's automatic bid to the 2017 NCAA Division I Baseball Tournament. The tournament was established in 1996, Conference USA's first season of play. Rice has won the most championships, with six. ==Seeding and format== The top eight finishers from the regular season will be seeded one through eight. The tournament will use a double elimination format. ==Bracket and Results== ==References== Category:2017 Conference USA baseball season Category:Conference USA Baseball Tournament Conference USA Baseball
title: 2017 Conference USA Baseball Tournament
